title: In client chat.
body: So we have probably all had the case, where we are playing a normal and call order gets the champion select going to shit because premades will lie to pretend their friend got it, can we please have in client chat standardized on server side rather then client side, make it so that the message has to bounce off the server and back before your message registers.

replies.body:
Agreed,

would also like draftpick... but that cant happen :(
It can, Rito just has to listen to the people.
yah tbh this would help a lot with champ select toxicity
